**IMPORTANT: READ FIRST**

Please do not report security vulnerabilities via public issues. Refer to our [Security Policy](https://github.com/shirishpothi/FileOrganizer/blob/main/SECURITY.md) for instructions on private reporting.

If you have already followed the private reporting process or if the vulnerability has been publicly disclosed elsewhere, please provide a high-level overview below.

## Overview
A high-level summary of the potential vulnerability.

## Impact
What is the potential impact of this vulnerability?

## Additional Information
Any other non-sensitive context or public references.
